attributes.action: In any further bids for rail franchises bar First and where they hold the franchise consider removing it from them
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is designed to remove First group from any rail franchises it holds and bar them from any future bids for rail franchises.

First Group (rail) has an apalling customer service record as well as an apalling reputation for the price of travel.

The British public will benefit from First Group (rail) ever holding a rail franchise again in the future.
